abstract.para:
Note: This document lists changes only since the 1.78.0 release. If you instead want a record of the complete list of changes for the codebase over its entire history, you can obtain one by running the following commands:
svn checkout https://docbook.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/docbook/trunk/xsl svn log --xml --verbose xsl > ChangeHistory.xml

sect1.title: Release Notes: snapshot_9779
sect1.para: The following is a list of changes that have been made since the 1.78.0 release.

sect2.title: Gentext
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the gentext code since the 1.78.0 release.

para.literal: tom_schr: locale/ca.xml; locale/da.xml; locale/cs.xml; locale/es.xml; locale/fr.xml; local⋯

screen.phrase: Added missing keycap context for ca, cs, da, es, et, eu, and fr
Added option key for keycap context
Added key="optional-step" as done in r9745
Add key="optional-step".

sect2.title: Common
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the common code since the 1.78.0 release.

screen.phrase: Make sure part and set titleabbrev are used in mode="titleabbrev.markup"
Add empty default template for titleabbrev since it is always processed in a mode.
Make consistent handling of titleabbrev in xrefs.
for missing title in xref, provide parent information of target to help locate problem element. Process bridgehead in mode="title.markup", not normal mode.
Fixed bug #3598963
Make sure bridgeheads are not numbered in all contexts, including html title attributes.

sect2.title: FO
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the fo code since the 1.78.0 release.

screen.phrase: Adjust exception for fop for menuchoice separator to use the $symbol.font.family if it is set.
Fix comment.
Fix typo that prevents param.xsl update.
Add mark.optional.procedure.steps param.
Fix bug in question template that output empty list-item-label when defaultlabel = 'none'.
Fix bug where part TOC not generated when partintro is present.
Footnotes can't be placed into fo:float
Remove margin-left when start-indent is used because they interfere with each other.
Use dingbat.fontset rather than dingbat.font.family so it falls back to symbol font if glyph not found, like other font properties.
Change last instance of inline.charseq in inline glossterm to inline.italicseq so it is consistent with the others.
Make consistent handling of titleabbrev in xrefs.

sect2.title: HTML
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the html code since the 1.78.0 release.

screen.phrase: Enumarete separate file for revhistory if generate.revhistory.link=1
Update the inline.charseq template to also call 'common.html.attributes' instead of using local-name for class value.
Enabling ITS processing again
Change syntax for selecting @its:* attributes so it works in xsltproc (which should work with the original, but doesn't).
Turn off its.xsl update which is generating attribute insertion errors.
Added basic support for ITS 2.0 markup. It gets propagated into HTML For more info about ITS see http://www.w3.org/TR/its20/
Added a comment line to test checkin process.
Fix bug in mode=remove-ids that put link content outside the <a> element.
Fixed SF ticket#3611689: added missing DocBook namespace declarations
Change the internal chunk.base.dir from a param to a variable.
Turn off id attribute on glossterm anchor, because it is on the element itself.
Turn off $admon.style if $make.clean.html is set to non-zero.
Added new definitions for syntax highlighting
Make active.olink.hrefs param work for chunked output too.
Make consistent handling of titleabbrev in xrefs.
Add round() function when pixel counts are used for image width and height.
fix missing class and id attributes on glossterm and glossdef.
Fix bug where prefer.index.titleabbrev ignored info/titleabbrev.

sect2.title: Manpages
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the manpages code since the 1.78.0 release.

screen.phrase: Fix a typo (http://bugs.debian.org/698962).
Fix bug 3599520: spurious newline in para when starts with whitespace and inline element.

sect2.title: Epub
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the epub code since the 1.78.0 release.

screen.phrase: Introduced variable in opf.guide
Improved modularization in opf.spine and created new spine.cover template
Improved opf.spine with info variable
Bugfix in opf.spine: removed double refentry entries
* Template package-identifier: introduced $info variable to simplify code (similar to the EPUB3 stylesheets) * Template opf.calloutlist: only call opf.reference.callout if callout.graphics is set

Backported Bob's EPUB3 changes to EPUB2 from r9740 -> r9742 -> r9743:
* Implement base.dir/OEBPS using internal chunk.base.dir instead of new param epub.base.dir.
* Additional changes, specific to this stylesheet: - Construct parameter epub.metainf.dir from base.dir + 'META-INF/' - Changed parameter epub.cover.filename epub.oebps.dir to chunk.base.dir - Template opf: concat base.dir with epub.opf.filename - Replaced two subsequent xsl:value-of's with concat()
Fix bug in author template generating a span element inside an attribute value.

sect2.title: Slides
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the slides code since the 1.78.0 release.

screen.phrase: Leave executable permissions for script.
Drop executable permissions from files.
Corrected path

sect2.title: Webhelp
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the webhelp code since the 1.78.0 release.

screen.phrase: Webhelp: Fix test for webhelp.include.search.tab param
Webhelp: Fix order of args to xsltproc
Webhelp: Turn on xinclude-test.xml in readme to demo xinclude functionality
Webhelp: In Makefiles, do xinclude in first pass at document

sect2.title: Params
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the params code since the 1.78.0 release.

screen.phrase: New param to turn off Optional text for optional steps.
Webhelp: Fix test for webhelp.include.search.tab param
Remove unneeded margin-left property from article appendix title. It interferes with the start-indent property.

sect2.title: Highlighting
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the highlighting code since the 1.78.0 release.

para.literal: Jirka Kosek: c-hl.xml; cpp-hl.xml; sql2003-hl.xml; php-hl.xml; upc-hl.xml; bourne-hl.xml; ⋯

screen.phrase: Added new definitions for syntax highlighting
